body_html:
Please refer #7653 for the above error.
Issues related to log_device_placement : #171 #8982 and SO issue.

Please take a look into these existing issues and try if they help you to resolve the error. I tried your code in colab and it worked. Please give a try in colab. Details on how to set to GPU in colab are given below.

  1. Go to Colab and open a new Python notebook
  2. Go to Edit->Notebook Settings-> Change the "hardware accelerator" to GPU and save. Run the code in the cell.
body_text:

Issues related to log_device_placement : #171 #8982 and SO issue.
Please take a look into these existing issues and try if they help you to resolve the error. I tried your code in colab and it worked. Please give a try in colab. Details on how to set to GPU in colab are given below.

Go to Colab and open a new Python notebook
Go to Edit->Notebook Settings-> Change the "hardware accelerator" to GPU and save. Run the code in the cell.
body:
Please refer #7653 for the above error.
Issues related to log_device_placement : #171 #8982 and [SO issue](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/39677168/tensorflow-documentations-example-code-on-logging-device-placement-doesnt-pr).

Please take a look into these existing issues and try if they help you to resolve the error. I tried your code in colab and it worked. Please give a try in colab. Details on how to set to GPU in colab are given below.

1) Go to [Colab](https://colab.sandbox.google.com/notebooks/welcome.ipynb#recent=true) and open a new Python notebook
2) Go to Edit->Notebook Settings-> Change the "hardware accelerator" to GPU and save. Run the code in the cell.
